text: kisima visvasavantayeku ghatanaya kirima kisima visvasavantayekuta sudusu næta; væradimakin misa. (obagen) kavurun ho yamkisi visvasavantayekuva ghatanaya kara dæmuvahot (eyata vandi vasayen) visvasavanta ek vahaleku nidahas kala yutuya. e samagama maranayata pat vuvage pavule udaviya (samava di) dayabarava athæra dæmuvahot misa, eyata sarilana vandi mudalakda ovun veta geviya yutuya. (meyata) ohu, obage saturu gotrikayin vasayen sita, visvasavantayeku vasayenut sitiyahot, visvasavantayeku vana vahaleku nidahas kalahot pramanavatya. (vandi gevimata avasyaya næta. meyata) ohu oba samaga givisum kara gat gotrikayingen sitinneku vasayen sitiyahot ohuge pavule udaviyata vandi mudala geviya yutu atara visvasavantayeku vana ek vahaleku nidahasda kala yutuya. (mese vandi vasayen geviya yutu mudala) kavurun ho at kara nogatahot ohu allah veta (tama varadata) samava illa masa dekak nokadava upavasaye yediya yutuya. allah hondin danneku ha gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
